column.name: user_id
column.remarks: id of the user owner of the document

column.name: ask_validate_by_tenant
column.remarks: if the document is of a type that is validable here is where the owner can ask a potential validator to validate it

column.name: uploaded_by_me
column.remarks: this is used to uinderstand if is uploaded by the owner so that he can edit

column.name: expiration_date
column.remarks: this will be inserted by hand

column.name: issuer
column.remarks: free text since not all issuers will have a tenant in MICADO

column.name: validable
column.remarks: if trhis document can be validated

column.name: validity_duration
column.remarks: the duration of the document in days

table.name: document_type_validator
table.remarks: this table map all the organizations that are eligible to validate that tenant

table.name: information
table.remarks: this is the generic event table for courses, news, etc that each organization wants to publish
